notifications.invalidServer_text: The server address you entered is not valid
notifications.unknownError_text: We could not perform the desired action this time. Please try again.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: As Seed só podem conter letras maíusculas (A-Z) e o número 9. A sua Seed tem carateres inválidos. Por favor, tente de novo.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: As Seeds devem ter pelo menos 60 carateres (idealmente 81). De momento, a sua Seed tem {seed.length} carateres. Por favor, tente de novo.
addAdditionalSeed.nicknameInUseExplanation: Please use a unique nickname for your seed.
addAdditionalSeed.enterSeed: Por favor, digite a sua Seed.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Looks like something went wrong while updating your password. Please try again.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: A sua palavra-passe está incorreta. Por favor, tente de novo.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: As palavras-passe não coincidem. Por favor, tente de novo.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least 8 characters. Please try again.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: You cannot use the old password as your new password. Please try again with a new password.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Assegure-se de que utiliza uma senha segura, com pelo menos 12 caracteres.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: A Seed foi copiada para a área de transferência e será ????? quando pressionar "CONCLUÍDO" ou decorridos 60 segundos (o que se verificar primeiro).
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Clique no botão em baixo e copie a sua Seed para o gestor de palavras-passe.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: As Seed só podem conter letras maíusculas (A-Z) e o número 9. A sua Seed tem carateres inválidos. Por favor, tente de novo.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: As Seeds devem ter pelo menos 60 carateres (idealmente 81). Atualmente a sua Seed tem {seed.length} carateres. Por favor, tente de novo.
enterSeed.pleaseEnterSeed: Por favor, entre a sua Seed.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: A seed deve ter 81 caracteres e deve conter letras maiúsculas A-Z e o número 9. A seed não pode conter mais que 81 caracteres.
enterSeed.neverShare: NUNCA PARTILHE A SUA SEED COM NINGUÉM

newSeedSetup.title: GENERATE A NEW SEED
newSeedSetup.text1: Press individual letters to randomise them.

saveYourSeed.text1: You must save your seed with at least one of the options listed below.

saveYourSeed2.explanation: Your seed is 81 characters read from left to right. Write down your seed and checksum and triple check they are correct.

saveYourSeed3.explanation: Click the button below and copy your seed to a password manager. It will stay in your clipboard for 60 seconds.
saveYourSeed3.text: Do not store the seed in plain text.

saveYourSeed4.explanation: Click the button below to print a paper copy of your seed.
saveYourSeed4.text2: Never share your seed with anyone.

nameYourSeed.text: Here you can enter an name for your seed.
nameYourSeed.label: Seed name
nameYourSeed.explanation: Enter a name for your seed to make them easier to differentiate.

setPassword.title: PASSWORD SETUP
setPassword.text: Now we need to set up a password.
setPassword.explanation: You will use this password to access your wallet in future. An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored on your device.
setPassword.reminder: Ensure you use a strong password of at least 12 characters.
setPassword.error1_text: Your password must be at least 12 characters. Please try again.
setPassword.error2_text: The passwords you have entered do not match. Please try again.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: The wallet is now set up and ready to use. If you need to make any changes in the future, look in the Settings menu.
